item.title: PostgreSQL9.6中使用mysql_fdw
item.description: 安装 mysql_fdw SELECT * from pg_available_extensions where name like '%fdw%'; name | default_version | installed_version | comment --------------+-----------------+-------------------+---------------------------------------------------- file_fdw | 1.0 | [null] | foreign-data wrapper for flat file
